basics.name: Vu Nguyen
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: "The only way to do great work is to love what you do"- Steve Jobs.It took me almost a decade to realize how important it is to do what I love in order to enjoy and achieve great work. It also took me about 2 years to find out what kind of work I enjoy doing. Since I switched my career to software development, I have been enjoying the journey so far and the future is really potential and bright.

highlights: UX/UI design for the venue page
Create a mockup html of the venue page with some fake data, using VueJS
Fix the date time picker to work with multi languages
Front-end developer in a team of 2 people

Together with the CTO, built a working web application for managing vehicles and payment from scratch in 3 weeks ( specifications are already in CTO's head, UI polishing and further improvement continue after that).
Researching and giving input about the technology to be used for the web application, mobile application
Updating UI for the mobile app and making some small changes as required
Responsible for the company's website ( Wordpress), from choosing the theme to the final version

For a Telecom Company client: automation testing for router's software. Working in Lab, building up, configuring, troubleshooting routers, switches, networks, traffic generators and other testing devices. Writing test script using TCL scripting language. Installing, testing software, finding and reporting bugs
For another client: automation tests for web application testing. Using Python, Robotframework, Selenium for automation tests.
Manual testing clinical system, patient monitors
Installing, testing software, finding and reporting bugs

volunteer.summary: Leading the association as a president
highlights: Leading the Board of Directors(6 members) to solve problems of the association such as organizational structure, responsibilities of each member, funding, conflict between members
Decision making, being the contact person to other organizations/partners.
Organising events such as cultural events, sport events, educational events

volunteer.summary: Practising Public Speaking and Leadership Skills. Attending meetings every other week
highlights: Evaluating/Giving feedbacks to other members speeches
